remarks: A quotient structure is a topological space.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Aug-2015.)
statement:
qustps.u $e |- ( ph -> U = ( R /s E ) ) $.
qustps.v $e |- ( ph -> V = ( Base ` R ) ) $.
qustps.e $e |- ( ph -> E e. W ) $.
qustps.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. TopSp ) $.
qustps $p |- ( ph -> U e. TopSp ) $.
